# wantsDefaultContentAppearance

**Type Property**

Determines whether the default content appearance should be used for the popover.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var wantsDefaultContentAppearance: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This method may be overridden to prevent the drawing of the content inset and drop shadow inside the popover. The default implementation of this method returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], which means that the content inset and drop shadow will be drawn. Overriding this method simply means implementing it to return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], which would mean that the content inset and drop shadow will not be drawn.
